title: How to Bake Pizza Snails

steps.headline: Warm the milk in a pan, and dissolve the yeast in the milk.
steps.description: Transfer mixture to a big bowl.

steps.headline: Add flour and all the other ingredients, and knead the dough until smooth.
Divide the dough in tree equally big parts, and form them to balls.
Leave to rest for some minutes.
Flatten out each dough ball and form them in rectangular shape, about 24x30 cm length and width.
Distribute the ketchup on the dough and add grated cheese and ham on top.
Roll each rectangular piece of dough to a roll, and cut the rolls into 8 equally big pieces.
Place the snails onto a pre-lined baking tray
Let them rise for about 20 minutes.
Bake for about 10 minutes in oven with temperature of 250 °C (482 °F).

text: Warm the milk in a pan, and dissolve the yeast in the milk. Transfer mixture to a big bowl. Add flour and all the other ingredients, and knead the dough until smooth.  Divide the dough in tree equally big parts, and form them to balls.  Leave to rest for some minutes. (3-5 minutes is good) Flatten out each dough ball and form them in rectangular shape, about 24x30 cm length and width.  Distribute the ketchup on the dough and add grated cheese and ham on top.  Roll each rectangular piece of dough to a roll, and cut the rolls into 8 equally big pieces.  Place the snails onto a pre-lined baking tray  Let them rise for about 20 minutes.  Bake for about 10 minutes in oven with temperature of 250 °C (482 °F).  Finished.
